overview: The singer Karl Schwamberger (Laokoongruppe) performs as an animated figure on a stack of postits, as the lyrics to Walzerkoenig roll past on a till roll. Alongside there is a video within a video, a train journey drawn with a highlighter, and from time to time the director reveals himself grabbing his coffee cup, or remodeling the film set as a miniature home disco.
title: Walzerkönig
